summary: A little HD retexture of the darkbrotherhood door !
descriptionHtml:
Hello, first of all i'm french so sorry if my english sucks !

Description :

In my opinion the texture of the darkbrotherhood door look so ugly, unfortunately i didn't find any retexture of it and for me it was a real problem to think every time i go in the sanctuary "Oh my god, this look sooo ugly !"
So i did a "small" 2048x2048 retexture of the door with glowing eyes !

Here is a before and after :

[IMG]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3749/13898057974_aee8f3d947_c.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7139/13897638185_54d726a61c_c.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3699/13899552165_00702c1964_c.jpg[/IMG]


Installation :

Just put the ".dds" file into your textures -> clutter folder.
If you don't have these folders just create them ;)

Compatibility :

Everything !

Check my imperial sword retexture : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52914/?
author: KinderBueno
